text: Giampietro is a given name. Notable people with the given name include: *Giampietro Campana (1808–1880), Italian art collector *Giampietro Cicoria (born 1984), Swiss footballer *Giampietro Perrulli (born 1985), Italian footballer *Giampietro Puppi (1917–2006), Italian physicist *Giampietro Silvio (1495 – 1552), Italian painter *Giampietro Stocco (born 1961), Italian science fiction and alternate history author *Giampietro Zanotti (1674–1765), Italian painter and art historian ==See also== *Giampietro, surname
title: Giampietro (given name)
